General.Name: Maiquer Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Maiquer Group CO., LTD engages in the production and sale of dairy products, beverages, baked, frozen drinks, and quick-frozen foods in China. The company's dairy products include sterilized milk, modulated milk, milk-containing beverages, and fermented milk; and baked goods include bread, cakes, pastries, moon cakes, and other products. It also provides agricultural products; livestock breeding and agricultural cultivation services; and festival products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Changji, China.

1.Name: Ms. Xue  Yao
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
